name: top_kernel_production
query:
SELECT 
        kernel,
        created_at,
        SUM(volume_pc) AS total_pc,
        SUM(qty_amount) AS total_qty,
        SUM(volume_hl) AS total_hl
      FROM 
        {source_volume}
      GROUP BY
        kernel,
        created_at

name: top_line_per_kernel_production
query:
SELECT 
        kernel,
        line,
        created_at,
        SUM(volume_pc) AS total_pc,
        SUM(qty_amount) AS total_qty,
        SUM(volume_hl) AS total_hl
      FROM 
        {source_volume}
        GROUP BY
        kernel,
        line,
        created_at

name: top_produced_products
query:
SELECT 
        product,
        created_at,
        SUM(qty_amount) AS total_qty
      FROM 
        {source_volume}
      GROUP BY
        product,
        created_at
